sentences.sentence: The bone mineral density (BMD) of left femora was measured.
sentences.translation: 取左侧股骨测量骨密度(BMD)。

sentences.sentence: Femora neck fracture; fracture fixation; Compress hollow screws.
sentences.translation: 股骨颈骨折；骨折固定术；中空加压螺丝钉。

sentences.sentence: Methods: Twelve matched pairs of human femora (mean age 64 years) were obtained.
sentences.translation: 方法：一共有12对股骨参与研究（平均年龄64岁）。
